item.title: Simple Python App Setup üë®‚Äçüíª</>
item.description: Introduction Many tutorials show you how to create a basic Python app with a couple of modules, but they rarely explain how to set up a whole project. This guide will show you how to set up a simple Python project with automated testing and a virtual environment for 3rd party packages. I have based it on Dead Simple Python: Project Structure and Imports by Jason C. McDonald with some opinionated changes.
